definitions.definition: In a fortunate manner. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
It is (or was, etc) fortunate that.
examples: Fortunately for Sam, his pet hamster was alive.
My mom has fortunately agreed to help us with the science project for school.

main_definition: In a fortunate manner. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
secondary_definitions: It is (or was, etc) fortunate that.
